title: Anthony Edwards Wins MVP as Team Stars Clinch 2026 NBA All Star

Anthony Edwards posted a team-high 13 points, including a three-point bucket to force OT, and Scottie Barnes drained the game-winning basket to lead Team Stars past Team World 37-35.
Jaylen Brown led up the offence with 11 points, and De’Aaron Fox hit the game-winning buzzer-beater three-pointer to lift Team Stripes past Team Stars 42-40.
Basketball fans were the biggest winner at the All-Star Game.
The 2026 NBA All-Star Game saw a new 'U.S. vs. World' format inject much-needed competition, with Anthony Edwards earning MVP honors.

The 2026 NBA All-Star Game unveiled a USA vs. World round-robin format at Intuit Dome that reignited pride, intensity, and real competition—proving the league might have found a fix for its long-criticized showcase.

Tyrese Maxey led the way with nine points while Anthony Edwards and Chet Holmgren each finished with eight points to elevate Team Stars to a 47-21 victory over Team Stripes in the final matchup of the 2026 NBA All-Star Game.
The NBA might have found an exciting format for future years with the 2026 NBA All-Star Game.
Former United States President Barack Obama and First Lady, Michelle, were among those in attendance for the NBA All-Star Game on Sunday.
For the basketball purist and casual fan alike, Sunday afternoon offered up the best the NBA has to offer.

title: Tyler Reddick Wins 2026 Daytona 500 for 23XI Racing
snippets: Toyota Racing driver triumphs in NASCAR's biggest race in a car co-owned by the NBA Hall of Famer.
Tyler Reddick won the Daytona 500 in a car owned by Michael Jordan when Chase Elliott crashed as he and Reddick were battling for the win.
Thanks to a buzzer-beater move befitting of Michael Jordan, Tyler Reddick won the biggest race in NASCAR.

DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. — Tyler Reddick won the Daytona 500 in a car owned by Michael Jordan when Chase Elliott crashed as he and Reddick were battling for the win in NASCAR’s season opener. Reddick, in a Toyota for 23XI Racing, led only one lap Sunday: the one to the checkered flag for the team owned by the NBA Hall of Famer and three-time Daytona 500 winner Denny Hamlin. “Just incredible how it all played out. Just true Daytona madness,” said Reddick, the 25th different driver to lead a lap for a new Daytona 500 record. “I’ve already lost my voice from screaming. Never thought I’d be Daytona...
DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. (AP) — Tyler Reddick wins the Daytona 500 in a car owned by Michael Jordan.

Reddick secured the victory after Chase Elliott crashed during their battle for the lead, making Reddick the 25th different driver to lead a lap in the race and setting a new Daytona 500 record.

title: Bryce Harper Responds to Dombrowskis 2025 Elite Player Comment
snippets: Philadelphia Phillies manager Rob Thomson revealed his thinking after the franchise slugger sent a Dave Dombrowski message.
Bryce Harper is not using Dave Dombrowski's assessment of his play last season as motivation for 2026.
